name: Vaultwarden
description: Lightweight Bitwarden server implementation. Self-hosted password manager.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  vaultwarden:
    image: vaultwarden/server:latest
    container_name: vaultwarden
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - DOMAIN={{DOMAIN}}
      - ADMIN_TOKEN={{ADMIN_TOKEN}}
      - SIGNUPS_ALLOWED=true
      - INVITATIONS_ALLOWED=true
      - WEBSOCKET_ENABLED=true
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:80"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=vaultwarden"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=security"

notes: Generate a strong admin token before deployment
Use behind a reverse proxy with HTTPS
Admin panel at /admin with admin token
